english.segment1: You called me Lord. You know my name. I'm standing out. I'm not ashamed. No, no
english.segment2: I've searched and came up empty. This world has nothing for me. You are my one and only
english.segment3: I'm living my life for You. And I'm giving everything to You. Not holding back, from every part. I'm giving it all to You
english.segment4: You are the Lord of all I am. And, I'll never be the same again. I've searched and came up empty. This world has nothing for me. You are my one and only
english.segment5: I'm living my life for You. And I'm giving everything to You. Find More lyrics at www.sweetslyrics.com. Not holding back, from every part. I'm giving it all to You
english.segment6: I'm living my life for You. And I'm giving everything to You. Not holding back, from every part. I'm giving it all to You
english.segment7: I'm living my life for You. And I'm giving everything to You. Not holding back, from every part. I'm giving it all to You
english.segment8: I'm giving it all to You. Take all of me. I'm giving it all to You. Take all of me
english.segment9: I'm giving it all to You. Take all of me. I'm giving it all to You. Take all of me.
